localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in Sacramento
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 345 Capitol Mall, right near the California State Capitol and just down the road from American River Parkway. If you are taking I-80 or US-50, take Exit 16A toward Capitol Mall. Our downtown Sacramento location is centrally positioned with easy access to public transit.

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding California Cash Advance Laws in Sacramento
stateCompliance.content: Sacramento County residents are protected by California's comprehensive consumer protection laws. The DFPI strictly enforces lending regulations.
keyPoints: Maximum loan amount is $300 including all fees
Maximum fee is 15% of check amount (460% APR typical)
Only one loan allowed at a time - rollovers prohibited
Lion Cash Advance is DFPI licensed and regulated
One $15 NSF fee maximum per bounced check
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is educational. California cash advance laws are subject to change. For current information, contact DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov. Consult a California attorney for legal questions.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Sacramento Area Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't reach our downtown location? We serve these nearby Sacramento area cities:

faq.question: Where is your Sacramento location?
faq.answer: We're at 345 Capitol Mall, Suite 180, right near the California State Capitol in downtown Sacramento. Take I-80 or US-50 to Exit 16A toward Capitol Mall. Easy public transit access.

faq.question: How fast can I get approved in Sacramento?
faq.answer: Most applications are approved within 30-45 minutes. Bring a valid ID, recent pay stubs, and checking account information for same-day funding.

faq.question: What's the maximum loan amount in California?
faq.answer: California law limits payday loans to $300 including all fees. With the maximum 15% fee, you can typically borrow up to $255.

faq.question: Are your fees fair and transparent?
faq.answer: Yes. California caps all fees at 15%. A $200 loan costs $30 in fees. A $255 loan costs the maximum $45. No hidden charges.

faq.question: Can I verify your California license?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Lion Cash Advance is licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation. Verify at dfpi.ca.gov/regulated-industries/regulated-entities-list/
